item.description:
Kick off the month in style!

The first Friday of each month, 5:30-9:30 pm

Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at mfafirstfridays. Enjoy fine art, live music, cash bars featuring signature cocktails, and a delicious tapas menu in the Koch Gallery. Relax and unwind in the breathtaking ambience.

Musical Lineup for Winter and Spring 2010:

February 5 - DJ Denise LaCarubba
March 5 - The David Eure Jazz Ensemble
April 2 - Grupo Fantasia Latin Ensemble
May 7 - Remix Jazz Trio
June 4 - Four Piece Suit

Open to visitors twenty-one and older.

Members: entry is FREE
Nonmembers: entry is FREE with Museum admission
item.how_to_find_us: No organizer will be present. See message board.
item.name: MFA Dancing & Art
